name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Platform Engineer with 13+ years of experience in building high-performance applications, adept in **AWS**, **Azure**, and **GCP** cloud services. Proficient in **Docker**, **Kubernetes**, **Terraform**, and implementing Infrastructure as Code (IaC) solutions. Familiar with **Jenkins**, **ArgoCD**, and **Gradle** for CI/CD pipelines, ensuring seamless deployment processes. Strong competence in monitoring and observability tools such as **Grafana**, **Prometheus**, **Loki**, **Mimir**, **ElasticSearch**, and **Kibana** to maintain system reliability. 

Skilled in JavaScript/TypeScript, Python, and **Flutter**, with hands-on expertise in frontend and backend development utilizing **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. Experienced in AI/ML-powered platforms for predictive analytics and real-time processing. Well-versed in compliance-driven development, aligning solutions with HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2 standards. Strong background in MLOps, including model training, serving, and orchestration using **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**.
